chat.welcome: Hi! I'm your AI image assistant. I can help with background changes, object removal, and more. Upload an image or describe what you'd like to do!
chat.startConversation: Start a new conversation to begin

imagePreview.title: Favorite Images
imagePreview.noFavoritesDescription: Click the heart icon on an image in the chat to save it here.

toasts.zippingPrepare: Preparing to compress {{count}} images, please wait.
toasts.zipFailedDescription: Unable to create zip file, please check console for more information.
toasts.conversationDeletedDescription: The conversation has been successfully deleted.
toasts.imageFavoritedDescription: The image has been added to your favorites.
toasts.imageUnfavoritedDescription: The image has been removed from your favorites.
